name: A Knightly Respite
description:
Flush with her biggest score yet, Ort, a young chijac thief, ducks into a roadside enclosure to escape the rain while she decides what to do with her ill-gotten gains.

But she’s shocked to find the hideaway is already occupied by a stately elven knight of the high court! Never one to suffer the nobility, Ort must resign herself to enjoying a night with a knight.
